name: 孫殷同
objective:
本課程介紹生產管理的角色，負責生產產品，為公司創造利潤。內容：生產基礎；生產規劃和排程；品質管制；生產庫存管理；財務績效評估；產能和制約理論。
This course introduces the strategic role of production management that is responsible for producing goods to generate profits for a company. Content: Production fundamentals; Planning and scheduling practices; Quality control; Production inventory management; Financial performance assessment; Capacity and constraints theories.
